TEI.2.document_title: J. Cable to Stephen F. Austin, 06-26-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. Cable to Austin, June 26, 1827. Introducing William Calahan.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1662

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p* J. Cable to Austin, June 26, 1827. Introducing William Calahan.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-26-1827">26th June 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr sir*/p*
*p*Permit me to introduce to your acquaintance *person_mentioned*Mr. William Calahan*/person_mentioned* of this place who is on a visit to your *location_mentioned*Settlement */location_mentioned*any politeness shone him will be greatly acknowledged by your assured friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Cable*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**location_mentioned* Austin's Colony. Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
